lines.text: Well, uh... hm. He's dead, so...
Your guess is that his cause of death is...
Technically! Wouldn't be dead if he couldn't die, right?
But, uh, for real... the cause of death's gotta be something we can tell from his body, right?
The guy didn't just drop dead of a heart attack, I can tell that much.
Why don't you get me something more specific? Some <c=#FF00FF>external</c> cause of death?
